metadata.title: CVE-2022-32532 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: Apache Shiro before 1.9.1, A RegexRequestMatcher can be misconfigured to be bypassed on some servlet containers. Applications using RegExPatternMatcher with `.` in the regular expression are possibly vulnerable to an authorization bypass.

criterions.comment: shiro package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
